meanings.definition: The first public performance or showing of a play, movie, or musical composition.
meanings.sent1: The premiere of the new movie was highly anticipated by fans.
meanings.sent2: I attended the premiere of the school play last night.
meanings.sent3: At the premiere, the actors accidentally swapped roles, creating a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The premiere of the song was like a grand opening ceremony for the music industry.
meanings.sent5: The premiere of the play left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: To present for the first time to the public.
meanings.sent1: The director premieres his latest film at the film festival.
meanings.sent2: She premieres her new fashion collection during Fashion Week.
meanings.sent3: The magician premieres his disappearing act, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The chef premieres his unique dish, surprising everyone with its delicious taste.
meanings.sent5: The artist premieres her masterpiece, capturing the attention of art enthusiasts.
